summary: Georgia "Georgie" Laura Henley  is an English child actress.
full_text: Georgina Helen "Georgie" Henley  is an English actress. She is best known for her portrayal of Lucy Pevensie in The Chronicles of Narnia film series, for which she won the Phoenix Film Critics' Society Award for Best Performance by a Youth Female in a Lead or Supporting Role in The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch and The Wardrobe in 2005, at only ten years of age.
title: Georgie Henley
